name: Chicken Co-op
description:
IMPORTANT NOTE: You can push the crate into the river. Description

These cute little chickens are trying to find their way back home. Help them on their perilous journey. 

GAMEPLAY

You need to move crates and statues to clear the way.

To open the gate you need to trigger all buttons in the vicinity simultaneously (by standing or putting objects on them.)

CONTROLS

WASD to move Chicken 1

Arrow Keys to move Chicken 2

R to go back to the start of the game (if you get stuck somehow)

Game Director + Programmer + 3D Modeler: Wahyu Candra (Me)

Level Designer: https://begeniro.itch.io/

This was made for LM0B Beginners Game Jam #26

If you find any bugs just Alt-F4 lmao
